requirement.Functionality: This function converts a name field returned by the cryptography module to a string that can be displayed to the user. It checks if there is a common name (CN) in the name field and returns it. If there is no CN, it returns the entire name field as a string.
requirement.Arguments:
:param name_field: x509.Name. The name field returned by the cryptography module.
:return: str. The converted name field as a string suitable for display.
